title: Love Island Australia introduces identical twin brothers Josh and Luke
text:
The new Love Island teaser begins with all the drama you'd expect from a show that revolves around thirsty singletons looking to hook up.

'A cyclone is about to hit,' an ominous voice announces, while another screeches, 'What on Earth is that?'

And then identical twins Josh and Luke appear - in all their hunky glory.

Double trouble! Meet Love Island Australia's identical twin brothers Josh and Luke, 25, as they prepare to shake up the Fijian villa

There's not an inch of body hair on either of them, and it's clear the homegrown hotties are ready to play.

In the video, both twins wear denim jeans and short sleeved shirts that reveal their washboard abs and ripped torsos.

They stare directly at the camera, before one says, 'I'm Josh and I'm twenty-five', and the other repeats, 'I'm Luke and I'm twenty-five.'

Hunky: In a promotional video, both twins wear denim jeans and short sleeved shirts that reveal their washboard abs and ripped torsos

The doppelgängers then run their fingers through their freshly blow-dried hair and strike various poses for the camera.

'Who's more handsome?' ponders Luke.

They don't seem to be able to agree, so to prove a point both twins strip off and flaunt their hard-earned hours at the gym.

Take it off! The doppelgängers then run their fingers through their freshly blow-dried hair and strike various poses for the camera

'If we had it our way, it would be just us two and five gorgeous girls [on Love Island],' announces Luke.

'Below the belt, he knows I've got him covered!' Josh then blurts out, before Luke simply shakes his head.

On Thursday, Love Island host Sophie Monk said fans should expect the unexpected on season two of Love Island.

The 39-year-old blonde bombshell told OK! magazine: 'There are a heap of new twists and turns on this season'.
